resources.string:
KONANE -- A Hawaiian Game

The game is played by two players.
BLACK always starts the game with turns alternating after that.
The game is like checkers where a player can capture their opponents piece by hopping over it with one of their own and landing in an empty slot.
If a player has no moves, he/she can pass and the other player plays either till he/she has no more moves or the other player can move again.
Every stone captured increases players score by 1.
Multiple hops are allowed in a turn but only with the same piece.
